Fast paced. Too intense for long sessions, but always delivers the thrills I need when I have to escape from a stressful day. Some bits are insanely hard until you crack it, like a puzzle, and that feeling is why I love this game. Plus the music is dope.

Father of the FPS genre came and took his crown again. At first look you think this game is too similar to Doom 2016 but oh boy you are wrong. ID Software took another step in the right direction and made the game more satisfying, worth to invest time on beating hard modes. The more you play, the more you'll RIP AND TEAR.
The game where you can embrace your inner monkey. Total primal rage on murdering stuff.

L'un des meilleurs tireurs de cette époque. Mieux encore, il n'est pas nécessaire de se cacher constamment pour récupérer de la santé ou de tirer sur une IA en état de mort cérébrale derrière les hauts murs de la poitrine.
Best shooter I've ever played. Most heart racing fps currently ever made. Possibly boasts the t levels.

One of the best FPS games I have ever played! The gameplay is insanely fast paced that it can give you an adrenaline rush from all of nasty stuff happening. Couple it with the best soundtrack for sure you will never stop killing demons until hell freezes over. Another thing I liked about this is the optimization where you can easily run 144+ fps with a mid tier PC/Laptop.

This game deserves the badge of coolest game ever created. I grew up on Quake 1 & 2, And the Half Life series. I don't get impressed easily. But some parts of this game blew my mind. The more you play, the further you advance, the more fun it becomes. Completed the campaign on ultra-violence and I had a lot of fun doing so.
Great campaign, great graphics and great combat system. Campaign is too short though.

This game was everything I wanted from a sequel of DOOM 2016. More demons, more guns and more awesomeness. I loved the new mechanics and new features (demons, guns, better puzzles etc...) and the music is cherry on top. I do have very few minor issues but none that took away from the overall experience. This is a hell of a game!
El dinero es temporal, pero DOOM ES ETERNO y el mejor juego jamás creado consíguelo ahora.
This game possibly has the smoothest action gameplay ever. The story really fun and offers a lot of extra lore to read through, if you like that kind of stuff.
Love the gore, love the slaughter, love the graphics, lovin the game. Really fun.
DOOM is back, and we're about to tear some demons to shreds. Fun Ripping and Tearing.

Get this game if you thinking about it i had great time with game + dlc's are also great with bigger challenges , still fun sad that mick (Mick Gordon created soundtrack for doom 2016 and eternal) couldn't make music for dlc's (David Levy and Andrew Hulshult created soundtrack for both dlc ) but still both did great job.
Excellent, well balanced and challenging game. battles, artwork, and music are all wicked.

Its a great game, good story, good gameplay, and good quality. The only problems I have with the game are problems of my own creation such as, its a demanding game and I have a lower quality pc. So if you have a pc with the minimum requirements on the steam page then go for it. Lower quality is playable but just very laggy.
Likes : Simply AMAZING graphics - best ever for a Doom game. The shooter experience too is fast & great.

column1: Dislikes: Would have liked the demons to look a bit larger in size on the screen.

Review: This game is an fps perfection. I can't describe how good it is just play it.
By now, everybody knows that DOOM Eternal is fun and runs great (Ryzen 5, RTX3060 smooth as butter on max settings).
Its like Doom 2016 with superior gameplay. Wished there was more to it but a fun gaming romp anyways. Get on sale.

If you want a fantastic single-player experience with amazing graphics, music and gameplay, get this game. If you don't want to make a Bethesda account just to access the game on startup, steer clear; unless you block the game from internet access. It's incredibly dumb that the campaign cannot be accessed without making a very insecure and rarely used account, but if you're not interested in the multiplayer mode and don't mind a bit of tweaking some windows settings to get around it, I think its worth it.
Jeu d'action parfait. Sérieusement, prenez ce jeu. Arrêtez de lire ceci et achetez-le.
Jedna od najboljih FPS igara ikad! Preporučite bilo kojem ljubitelju pucačina iz prvog lica!

Loved the first one so much I had to buy Doom Eternal. At times the story would lose me and some of the new game mechanics took some getting used to but overall it was a nice play through and would recommend it to anyone that wants a good run and gun.
Great game. It has more testostorone weight lifting competition. Mechanics are amazing.

I've done 2 playthrough's of the game, and I can confidently say it is a masterpiece. The gameplay loop is extremely fun and killing demons never felt better. The game is a lot more difficult than the previous game in the series. The story is heavily improved and the many missions you go on all have detailed surroundings. And the multiplayer was really good. The new features are great and new. And last the platforming was great and helped break up the combat.
дота 2 крекер дота 2 крекер дота 2 крекер дота 2 крекер дота 2 крекер дота 2 крекер
Campaign has so much replayability and the feeling you get after beating some difficult encounters is gratifying. Fantastic game.

One of the best shooters I've ever played. Game play variety is beautiful, every enemy has choreographed attacks, unique abilities, making the battles feel like a chess game as you dance around the map fighting demons. The music is top notch and some of the most dynamic, god-complex inducing tracks I've ever heard in a game.
Fantástico juego de disparos y plataformas en primera persona. Gran historia lineal y progresión. Geniales armas.
Literally amazing. movement is spectacular, incredibly well implemented, had more of a story that Doom 2016, and the gunplay felt amazing i had so much fun playing.
Amazing experience if you would like new gameplay loop. Killing hordes of demons was never this fun and challenging at the same time.

This game is hard even on easy setting. The developers were having a good time creating a game that can stress people up deliberately. They know its hard that's why they give u a sentinel armor option if u die more than 3x in a fight.. pretty insulting. Not all players play to become a mass murderer. Some just play for fun and to appreciate lovely graphic art in a game.
Ótimo jogo. Eu amo como a tradição é opcional, mas ainda existe para aqueles que gostam, ao contrário do último DOOM. A jogabilidade é super divertida e rápida.

I've been playing this game on and off since release, starting over whenever i did. However i finally finished the game. Doom eternal is a fun game that causes the player to actually get involved and think on their feet on higher difficulties. It is a good game and a good way to get you thinking. I wish there was a lower states mode i could play with friends like horde mode coop or something but the campaign is pretty good overall.
This is probably the most fun game you will ever play it is packed to the brim with gameplay and its very challenging too.

After putting in a hundred hours into the game I think I its safe to say that I think the game is a masterpiece and easily the best fps I have ever played it demands so much more of the player rather than playing mindlessly.
Fun game, recommended to players with prior fast paced FPS experience. Average around 15 hours.
Good game, great graphics, very fun! sometimes it can be hard to find where you need to go, but that is only 1 bad thing, and the rest is good.
DOOM ETERNAL is DOOM 2 plus modern graphics and arena combat with a dash and jump added.
A badass soundtrack that comes with a dank ass game with a little bit of spice from hell.
Very good FPS, level design with small onions, catchy and punchy music. Really excellent. If you liked DOOM 2016, this is only the culmination of it, so go for it.
Great game - good gameplay with puzzles and challenges along the way. Some of the "platform" type stuff can appear daunting, but I usually got there after a few attempts.
I love this game. Break your enemies, show them the meaning of fear. Fear the slayer.

VERY GOOD GAME! one of my favorites it has a lot of unique mechanics that take a bit to get used to but that adds a good challenge doom is so fun the demon models look sick and the combat is very fun and rewarding.
The doomiest doom since doom. From a strictly gameplay perspective this makes all other shooters obsolete.
If you like ripping arms off demons and beating them to death with it then buy the game.

Bad-ass dude with guns that can shred demons at the gates of hell... what more can you ask for. The best single player shooter out there with loads of challenges and hidden items to collect. Quite an interesting story that sort of summarizes the entire journey of the Doom slayer and concludes it perfectly, at least according to me and for me.
Bloody brilliant if you are thinking of buying wait for a sale and do so, the fighting is extremely satisfying. the soundtrack pulls you in and dosent let go!
Very good story, controls, graphics, and leveling. No complaints whatsoever.

Honnêtement, ce jeu est génial, il a tout, une bonne courbe d'apprentissage, de grands ajustements de difficulté, se sentir bien au combat, j'ai adoré jouer à ce jeu jusqu'à présent et je le recommanderais à d'autres.

ID Software understands their audience. What more can you ask for over killing hordes of demons to an epic metal soundtrack. The fluidity of combat, the frenetic movement and speed, it's all years and years of a wonderful formula literally perfected. It's a great, stupid time!
Literalmente no puedo dejar este juego. Es tan bueno. Sólo conseguirlo. Tan divertido tan bueno.
Great game, fun and enjoyable on lower difficulties; challenging, fun and enjoyable on higher difficulties.
Really fun and fast paced game, I would only not recommend it in case it's actually too fast for some people.

Ich empfehle dringend, dieses Spiel zu kaufen, es ist alles, was ich von einem FPS-Spiel wollte und noch mehr. es kann manchmal etwas schwierig sein, aber es wäre langweilig, wenn es kein hartes Spiel wäre, da alle DOOM-Spiele ziemlich hart sind.

Я играл в эту игру на кошмарном уровне сложности с нулевым опытом смерти, прежде чем играть в эту игру. это было утомительно, разочаровывающе и болезненно. Спустя более 20 часов я, наконец, достигаю последнего уровня и наслаждаюсь каждой минутой. Эта игра проверила мою точность, время реакции, управление ресурсами и память больше, чем любая другая игра, в которую я играл раньше. Я настоятельно рекомендую ее всем, кто с нетерпением ждет потрясающего шутера от первого лица.

An epiphany of violence and gore. And art form of clicks and clacks. A picture painted of glory kills and fire. Hands down the best FPS money can buy, one that will challenge all of your physical gaming limits. Disgustingly well optimized. Stunning visuals.
Another great game from ID as always. Lives up to the DOOM standards and will always be one the greatest FPS franchises ever !!!!!
This game is amazing!!! It is so action packed and I just love it. On top of that, it is so good looking and optimized.
Pretty great game to be honest. The puzzles and combat are hard but very fun.
There's a possibility our world could get taken over by demons in the future. This game is going to be a great help to add skill to your survival. Beast mode.

Just buy it. It's like nothing else out there right now, and heart-poundingly challenging at times. Lots of good bonuses and easter eggs as usual, blah blah blah. From what I can tell it's very well optimized as well, I never experienced and chugging at all. Couple freezes and one or two bugs which forced me to reset the level (which was frustrating), but overall a complete gem.
Uno dei migliori giochi che abbia mai giocato. Sul serio è eccellente e funziona bene.
Эта игра превратила меня в машину для убийств. Ключ к завоеванию любви к игре, в том, чтобы играть по её правилам, как задумал разработчик, а не как хочется игроку.
Yes has you can see that pretty intense gameplay cause this game is a FAST-FPS like quake.

column1: The level design is just incredible and artistic direction is breathtaking. For all monster and mobs there is different AI for each one and all of the weapons are so much powerful. The most important for me is the diversification of the gameplay cause all demons have a strength and weakness.

Review: Even on the easiest setting difficult and tough but really fun. Would recommend.
This is actually a really good game. Whoever came up with these insane graphics is a genius.
El mejor tirador jamás creado. Qué más puedes decir sobre esta obra maestra?
Gritty and fast great sound track that's heavy. Graphics are insane 4K Bloody and intense, everything DOOM promises to be and more. Great Game im really enjoying it.
It's very good. One of the fastest games I have ever played. Game is well optimized. Get on sale.

As someone who thought DOOM 2016 was in some areas overrated, over hyped and overstated DOOM eternal proved to not only meet but exceed my expectations! gone are the bland, arid and generic levels of doom 2016 and in are the new vibrant, varied and frenetic levels of doom eternal. the soundtrack has been dialed up to 11. In a surprising twist by lowering the ammo capacity orders of magnitude from 2016 it makes the player switch weapons more on the fly, this has the effect of spicing up the game-play. Everything about DOOM eternal is polished, perfected and most importantly fun!
First Doom game I've played. I was immediately blown away. It's just amazing. That's all that needs to be said.
Fast & brutal FPS, the difficulty ramps up quite a bit but it is as expected in a game like this. If run & gun is your thing, if you enjoy violence & the devil.

First of all this game is awesome but it has it share of problems like the game being too hard or getting stuck on places i really loved the collectiables and skills you can use.The levels are made with love and passion and it shows.The multiplayer has seen better days you can barely find an match  what happened to the classic deathmatch style of doom? The story wasn't very good but the action was. By letting the player switch guns more often it makes you feel like you are in a rush to kill all the freaking demons with the ability to dash and double jump makes it even quicker.The enemies are deadly as ever you always have to keep running or they will kill you instanly no kidding.
Another masterful DOOM game, with an amazing soundtrack from the legend Mick Gordon.

Very, very good. Probably the best first person shooter to come out since Half Life 2. Of course the two cannot be compared being such different games in such a rich genre. This game is punishing as it should be. It gives you the tools to pull off incredibly satisfying sequences against enemies who genuinely feel dangerous because of their fast movement and high damage output. Luckily, your movement and damage is just as potent. It really feels like The Only Thing They Fear Is You. (Best videogame OST period by the way).

First, i like to say like the doom 2016, i LIKE this game a LOT!! fast paced, difficult but challenging and very fun. As i say above, this game is much more difficult than its predecessor but it's giving more challenge and force you to be smart too. But what i don't like about this game is the platforming section which is annoying at times and slow down the pace. And the soundtrack? It's still good especially The Only Thing They Fear Is You and Meathook, but the overall soundtrack for me is still inferior to the doom 2016 soundtrack. But i recommend this game and buy it when on sale.
Good old doom. U feel the power of the guns. Game is really hard on higher difficulty. Good old pew pew just with nice graphics now.

7/10 TL:DR way too difficult, only for hardcore FPS gamers Pros:+ adding dashing and double jump off the bat+ still has some epic fights like in 2016+ a lot of cool things to do outside the campaign+ new weapon abilities+ entertaining scenes & dialogue+ easier to upgrade guns than in 2016Cons- Imbalanced overwhelming comically hilarious difficulty. Even with mods and toggling easy, the last few levels were completely bananas. The difficulty is great for hardcore FPS players, not fun, and inaccessible for everyone else.- ammo is scarce for the number of demons you have to deal with.- A giant toolbox to manage during intense fights, not a big detractor but could be streamlined like in DOOM 16.- Buff Totems - a hidden totem on the map that spawns and buffs current demons until you find it and destroy it. The demons are so strong they can kill you late game on easy if you can't find the totem in time.this should be something you can turn off.- certain runes should not be runes but in the game already, ie "better air control", how about just make that a thing in the first place.- the upgrade system is more convoluted than 2016 Other thoughts:I installed mods to try to mitigate the difficulty and it made things ok until the last few levels where things became overwhelming again. You have to be some sort of hardcore genius to play this game even on normal (hurt me plenty) without mods. And I would not recommend this game to my worse enemy on console due to the controller. This could have been a 9 or 10 but the devs got in their own way imo

This is NOT Doom.  It is Doom Raider, a cross between Tomb Raider and Super Mario jumpy climby platform puzzles and some Doom weapons and creatures. It misses the point of Doom where you shoot your way through hordes of increasingly tough demons with increasingly powerful weapons.  This game has you constantly low on ammo and always doing the boring special takedowns so you can get the ammo to fly out of a demons guts unitl you run out of ammo a few seconds later and have to rinse/repeat.  Combat is literally a series of special kill animations that became boring and just destroyed thepoint of Doom. It has literally zero redeeming features.
One of the best fps arena shooters ever made. Improves on the sequel on almost every way and makes for brilliant action game.

Practically everything that they got so right in Doom 2016 is spoiled here, the freedom of approach and endless variety of encounters that it successfully inherited from the original Doom is all gone, it's now just the same routine over and over until it's excruciatingly dull. There's basically only one way to play it. This is the 3rd time I've started the game... I got about 2 hours in before I was bored and frustrated, which is at least more than I've managed before but there's nothing there to make me want to go back to it any time soon.
Шутер, где используется практически все механики, которая предлагает игра. Такое редко где увидишь.
Fun shooter. Improves upon a lot of the previous doom game and adds more depth. The levels are a lot more varied and are much more enjoyable to explore. The improved movement is a joy.
Once you get used to the platforming stuff, it becomes a really fun and exciting game to play.
Doom Eternal is the most fun and well designed single player shooter that I've played in a long time.
Doom Eternal is my second favorite doom game after Doom3, beautiful level design and epic soundtrack make this memorable experience!
Great game much better than Doom 2016. Gameplay is pretty much perfect and soundtrack is amazing.
Best singleplayer arena shooter ever made. The combat and movement is a masterpiece.
Some of the most fluid and satisfying gameplay in a shooter. Zipping around and killing demons at fast pace with an amazing soundtrack to back you up, what's not to love?

Probably the best singleplayer shooter I've played. Blows the previous games out the water in terms of combat mechanics, enemy ai and movement. Platforming is massive improvement over the Doom 2016 which had instant death from falling down from platforms. In this game if you fall off a platform it just takes a bit of health and respawns you back. The platforming itself is nice breather from combat and is quick, easy and fluid to complete due to enchanted movement.
i never seen any bugs,it have good level designs,it have exotic guns etc. i like it
Great combat arena shooter. Love the graphics and retro style that pays homage to original doom games.
I always loved this game. Great graphics, performance, gameplay, levels and even lore is cool. The recent ray tracing update is pretty amazing.
Much better game than the previous Doom. Tougher but fair. Better combat and more tactical. Movement is bonkers fast. Levels are more interesting. Whats not to love?
Really fun frantic action shooter. Loved everything about it. Though the multiplayer is interesting it gets boring quick.

Doom Eternal tops its predecessor by adding much need depth to the combat, enhancing the slayers maneuverability, more interesting levels/locations, better more aggressive AI, rock solid id tech 7 and once again killer soundtrack by Mick Gordon.

One of the absolute worst games thats been released in a long time, a blot on the legacy of Doom and the (formerly) good reputations of both Id Software and Bethesda Games. If you expect anything of value or any shreds of entertainment to be had from this game. An absolute slog at best, complete sewage at worst its shocking that something of this quality can be released in this golden age of gaming. Boring, bland, bothersome gameplay, that punishes the player for trying anything outside of the hardset limits the game has in place. Why they did this? I can't even imagine why, maybe to appeal to older games who have gotten slow and stupid in their advanced age or young kids that can barely count to 3 yet but the design choice is truly appalling and downright insulting to the average gamer. A drastic decrease in weapon and enemy variety from past releases, the same imps and cacodemons either reskinned or outright reused in parts of the game you'd hope for something fresh. I'm talking 20 hours in and its the same enemies you're expected to be tackled in the same way. The bosses suffer from this problem too, the same cyberdemons or barons of hell barely sized up and maybe with a new coat of paint dropped in almost at random seemingly just to pad the game out instead of testing the players skills (something they realized they wouldn't need to do, due to the redundant gameplay i mentioned earlier). The graphics are a major step back in terms of quality. Doom 2016 looks lightyears ahead in terms of quality, shoddy texture work, low poly models and atrociously bad animations, the absolutely rushed state of the game is on full display in an area you expect even the most lackluster of games in this current generation to at least somewhat succeed in. In terms of weapon variety, as I mentioned earlier, severely lacking in variety. Only 3 weapons available in the entirety of the game, one being a hidden reward from a boring collectathon sidequest and even then not worth the time to unlock it, as I've already explained at length how the game punishes any variety. The HUD and UI is laughably bad, looking like it was designed in some cheap knockoff of photoshop, barely conveying any information regarding damage or the status of your character to the player, as well as cluttering the screen with useless text and effects. Speaking of the character, Doomguys design is an extreme downgrade from past titles. In a cheap attempt to capture nostalgia from past games it just comes off as being an homage to the artwork of Tom of Finland. Gaudy and grotesquely built its a slap in the face to human anatomy and good character design across so many other games. The art direction of the entire game feels this way, definitely not aided by the low quality graphics. Going from gross and gory, to extravagantly bland, I'd hate to see what the concept art was like if whats on display in the final game looks this bad. One would expect sprawling scenic environments of a real hell on earth, all that you get greeted with is a low poly 4 year olds idea of hell. The story is truly the crown jewel of just how bad this game gets. Nonsensical boring dialogue, lengthy drab cutscenes and retcons of the worst degree are just some of the gems in store for you if you pick this game up. The character of Samual Hayden has been absolutely mangled, going from proud noble futurist scientist, to disturbed, almost child predator creep. His weird obsession with the frighteningly young intern character reflects a strange creative choice by the devs, to the point I almost believe someone on the writing team was projecting their own desires on this cast of characters. The character of Doomguy truly got the brunt of these bad decisions. The cool, restrained, angry demeanor presented in 2016 has been completely replaced with this psychopathic, enraged persona that isn't helped by the awful voice acting, that I can only guess was provided by some bum on the street they hired to record his lines. The voice acting problem is reflected on the entirety of the extensive new cast of characters but is notably bad for Doomguy. The story is completely incoherent with timeskipping and constant planet hopping that would put the modern Star Wars movies to shame. The twist that the Dark Lord thats been hyped up the entire game being Doomguy from an alternate timeline comes out of complete left field, due to the amount of hilariously bad red herrings and false twists I almost feel must have been left over from old versions of the script that they must never have been improved upon. This trainwreck of a game truly goes to show how far down the level of quality has dropped for AA devs. The reputation of these companies I don't  think can ever be recovered just because of how hard they dropped the ball on this one. Why something like this was made and released, especially from the devs that brought us Morrowwind and Wolfensteinn. My final review for this game is a concrete 0 out of 10....

Не смотря на некоторые нюансы, Doom Eternal это прекрасный сиквел, он прокачал то что и так работало, отсек все ненужное, и подал к столу. Doom почти никогда не базировался на сюжетной составляющей, она всегда была ли ж стимулом изничтожать альтернативно живых существ, поэтому Doom с подзаголовком Eternal не совершил революции в этом плане, если вы ждёте от Dooma сюжета то это довольно бессмысленное занятие. Для меня Doom 2020 года отличный шутер с крепким геймплеем, который в тех условиях которые создали разработчики прекрасно работает.
Best combat system I've played in a while, takes practice to master, feels amazing when you master it.
Probably one of the best FPS games ever made. Blood and gore simulator is what it is.
Best Doom game since Doom 2. Like a mix of Metroid Prime and Quake. This game is pure amazingness.
This game is absolutely amazing, great graphics, non-stop action and is just really fun to play. 100% worth the money.
It pushes the envelope of arena combat design and makes one of the frantic and challenging gameplay experiences you can get today.
The most fun I've had playing any game at all. I'm a sucker for fast paced games and this one just does it for me. This game is so worth it!
Amazing and beautiful i recommend it to everyone it is worth the sixty dollars easily.
The gameplay loop of this game is like injecting pure dopamine right into my brain. I actually can not remember the last time I had this much fun in a shooter.
Highly addictive, strategically challenging, communicatively demanding. I love this game!
This game is worth it for the sick music alone, but slaughtering huge hordes of demons makes it even better.
A fearsome beast. Hail the doom slayer. Just like the game itself. Recommended.
In my opinion this is the best fps game to come out in 10 years. Simply perfect.

RIP AND TEAR ! In my opinion Doom Eternal is one the best singleplayer shooters from 2020. I just received the game not long ago and the amount of fun is enormous. From my perpective 10/10 in the case of gameplay. Story ? maybe 8/10 or 8.5/10 its good . But the doom is more about the action then story . Story is there to add climate.

Lo que se puede decir de esta obra maestra que ya no se haya dicho? En serio, este juego está tan bien hecho, que incluso alguien a quien generalmente no le gustan los fps se las arregla para jugarlo sin parar.

The Music, Gameplay and map design seamlessly mix together to create the Video Game experience equivalent to an upper. Probably one of the best first person shooters ever. Everything is perfect, gameplay, aesthetic, exploration, lore, story. Doom is still the king of FPS games.
Doom staje się coraz lepszy. Doom 2 był pierwszą strzelanką, w którą grałem, a seria Doom nadal króluje w branży gier, jeśli chodzi o fps. Jest szybki, trudny, a kampania jest niesamowita.
It's like the fun level from other FPS games except it's for the whole game.
Me mató un zombi normal en Ultra Nightmare, casi me rompo el teclado. Aunque es un gran juego.
This game is like a pit bull high on cocaine let loose in a daycare with a bunch of toys.
Can't help yourself but to have an evil grin the whole time while playing this game. Fun factor is OVER 9000!
Good game. Fun to play. I really wish Hugo Martin was my dad was my dad way my dad.
ID did a great job. A huge step up from Doom (2016). Hard to go back with all the improvements.
It's Doom Eternal, more of everything great about Doom 2016 but more polished and deeper. Is there anything else to say?
Very interesting story and very fun to be able to explore so much. Combat is perfect.
Fun and fast gunplay with enough depth to keep you entertained for the entire campaign.
This game is absolutely amazing, great graphics, non-stop action and is just really funt to play. 100% worth the money.

Doom Eternal is one of the best games I've ever played, and I've played a lot of them. Coming from 2016 Doom, it's basically just makes EVERYTHING better. The Gameplay: Faster and more challenging. The Weapons: Super satisfiying and immensely powerful. The Music: You already know has amazing it is. In every way, it's a step up from Doom 2016, and then some. But come with a warning, it doesn't pull it's punches. You will die on anything past ultra nightmare, a lot. But it's really good at teaching you the way it wants you play. And if you let it, it's one of the most fun and stressful things you could ask for. It's Doom, what more could you ask for?
As fps junkie and playing many shooters in my years  I've seen three decades of progress of the shooter. Doom Eternal may be the peak of our time.
Great game. Beat the living crap out of everything you see. Demonic ripping.
10/10 best game play and best soundtrack. Graphics look sick and more like classic doom games.
Ce jeu m'a donné tellement de testostérone que je me suis séparé de mes hormones œstrogènes juste pour combattre mon clone féminin.
I like shooting demons and chainsawing them apart. This provides this. 10/10.

I think this game is a masterpiece. It's absolutely gorgeous to look at, hectic to play and so cleverly designed. From one point-of-view, the entire game seems to be one gradually paced tutorial in how to become the ultimate Doomslayer; being able to utilise all of his extensive capabilities to annihilate demon scum at a frenetic pace without getting bruised. You will get bruised learning how to do this, but by the end your competence in abilities will have you zipping around in a blur like an unstoppable, godlike killing machine with the viscera of your slain foes raining down around you in a mist of blood, giblets and fireballs. It's everything Doom should be. The Doomslayer is such a baddass, and he makes you want to become the baddest badass you can be, and that's the whole point. There is no action shooter in the same class as this, that I've come across. The soundtrack is perfect, there is a lot of depth to mods and upgrades and limitless replayability with hunting secrets, achievements and unlocking abilities of many, many flavors. Platforming elements have been introduced which serve well to add a new dynamic to the gameplay. I found this game to be a little intimidating at first, but stick with it and you will understand why it's so great. I also find it more enjoyable and less frustrating than it's precursor.

This is, by far, the best FPS I've ever played! So much action and entertainment that I never want to stop playing. Lots of quick thinking and some problem/puzzle solving, both creating an amazing game; it has to be one of my favorites. Would 100% recommend to everyone!

Overall great game. The story from Doom Eternal (DE) has been expanded: telling the origins of the Doom Slayer/Marine, while creating new lore for the new series. Those expecting Doom 2016 gameplay are in for a surprise as the DE ramps up the speed and adds more classical gaming elements such as 1UP pickup and "cartoonish" sounds (ie. blood splat sounds effects). Some weapons have been nerfed from previous series, thus allowing more of a balanced and fair but fun gameplay.

This is everything you could ask from a single player FPS even if you don't like all the fictional theme;First of all, the pc optimization is one of the best I've ever seen; then you have the smooth movement that comes with the non-stop violent action in very well-designed platforms and levels that make the game even better. This is also one the few single player FPS that pushes you to think before you engage in a battle with all the variety of enemies and weapons, everything has a purpose and that's what makes doom eternal one of the best in its genre. The only downside is I can't imagine how you could possibly top this one because I don't see anything you could do better, so good luck for the future fps devs.

This game is pretty bad. Story is nonexistent. At mission 3 they started giving me 6 ammo to kill 30 enemies, even after I chose all the ammo upgrades. Then I got to another area where the path forward was completely hidden. I had to look up a guide on how to proceed... And then again, another path forward extremely esoteric, and again and again... wtf. I find so many things about this game way more annoying than Doom 2016. The people saying this game is better are out of their damn minds. It seems like there are so many poorly designed things in this game. Many really frustrating/annoying and buggy things that make me think very poorly of the people that made this game. If you want to collect all the items/secrets it's pretty much required to use a guide. Even with them being revealed on the map it's still extremely obscure how you're supposed to get to many of them. I see later on that you're supposed to use the chainsaw to get ammo, but that's a really bad mechanic due to the fact that it only regens 1/3 and you need 3/3 to kill big guys, so you can't just waste it on little guys to get ammo or you won't have it when you need it. Difficulty level of certain parts was just ridiculous. I've been playing competitive FPS games at a high level for over a decade. I had to BOTH set it to the easiest difficulty AND choose the special armor option that basically makes you invincible. There's just too much going on at once, too fast. Two bosses plus 15 different enemies shooting, throwing, and charging you from all sides. Pure chaos. The way the battle was designed just completely zapped my interest. I found it more enjoyable on the lowest difficulty where I could actually focus on using the many tools they give you, rather than just running around trying not to get hit. They even nerfed the BFG to the point where it only kills small to medium enemies. The last fight was dumb and more of the same chaos. I was glad when the game was over. I definitely regret buying this game. Ancient Gods DLC 1 is just more of the same but more fighting, harder enemies, and new enemies. And even more problems that constantly make me say "what a garbage game". Ancient Gods DLC 2 - finally they do something right. The sentinel hammer is good design. And they finally make the auto shotgun usable in certain situations. Final boss fight was incredibly boring and a total waste of time.

masterpiece. In a word, masterpiece. The game successfully delivers everything it promises you. Although I hate the arcade FPS genre, this game is amazing. First of all, the graphics are very beautiful even though they don't show themselves in the game. When we say beautiful graphics, we immediately think of meadow grass as in RDR. However, the graphics that we cannot appreciate due to the pace of this game are amazing. They take damage from wherever you hit the demons. You can clearly see how each bullet you shoot can cause damage. In addition, the game has added weak points to most enemies so that you do not rely only on your strength. If you don't think tactically and jump in front of everyone with your gun, you will die. The biggest mistake in the game's gameplay is that even after defeating the guy called Marauder as a boss, he throws it in front of you. The difficulty of the game should be enjoyable, if it is time consuming, it will be boring and annoying. Another good thing about the game is that you can enjoy it without knowing anything about its story. We used to do this for Half-Life back then. This game is like that. It doesn't have much of a story, but its lore is vast. If you want, you can also enjoy the story by reading the papers you have collected. Let's not forget the music, make sure to play the game with headphones. The music of the game is so appropriate to the theme of "violence" that the music fixes the idea in your mind: "They are not yours, you are their enemy". Although I completely turn off the music of the game and turn on classical music, the effects in the game prevent the calm. Great job done on the sound. I don't like FPS. I don't like arcade FPS at all. However, there is little that can be said badly about this game. A masterpiece that everyone should try. God bless hands of everyone who contributed.
